function: Detects potential loss of valued things
authentic_output: Forward-thinking preparation to prevent or address potential losses
corrupted_output: Becomes obsessing over unlikely losses or trying to control everything
information_provided: Something you value could be taken away

misread_risks.disambiguate: fear = protective orientation; excitement = approach orientation
fear decays naturally; paranoia persists without external signal

consent.notes: fear-state signals must never be used for coercion

glyph_mapping.bridge: fear-as-sensor = tension edge between value and threat surfaces
glyph_mapping.mandala_spin_role: tests structural resilience; ensures protective preparation does not calcify into obsessive control

provenance.cultural_frame: Elder Logic — emotions as sensors, not flaws
